thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 9 of 61
thread.title: Joanne

author: Joanne
title: Joanne
text: I ordered a Bless sale coat and pair of jeans and it was unbelievable free shipping and arrived the next day! The coat was great but the jeans, although marked 26 and S were huge!! almost like a 29 but I could not return as it was a final sale which I feel is unfair because they were definitely sized incorrectly. I have worked in luxury retail for more than 20 years and feel customers should have a chance to return.
